sources.title: The Mysterious Mr.  M! (1946) 13-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 13-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Dennis Moore, Richard Martin, Pamela Blake
Directors: Lewis D. Collins & Vernon Keays

A Master criminal has set up a secret hideout beneath the mansion of his wealthy and respectable grandmother. He intends to steal the valuable prototype of a revolutionary giant-sized submarine invented by the renowned Dr. Kittridge and blame his dirty deed on a fictitious villain.  

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00      PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:26      CHAPTER 1:    When Clocks Chime Death
21:16    CHAPTER 2:    Danger Downward
39:43    CHAPTER 3:    Flood of Flames
57:38    CHAPTER 4:    The Double Trap
1:15:27 CHAPTER 5:    Highway Execution
1:32:42 CHAPTER 6:    Heavier than Water
1:48:12 CHAPTER 7:    Strange Collision
2:06:42 CHAPTER 8:    When Friend Kills Friend!  
2:23:48 CHAPTER 9:    Parachute Peril
2:43:09 CHAPTER 10: The Human Time-bomb
2:59:25 CHAPTER 11: The Key to Murder
3:14:42 CHAPTER 12: High-line Smash-up  
3:31:04 CHAPTER 13: The Real Mr. M!
3:49:48 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: An evil scientist known as "Mr. M." uses a drug he has developed called "hypnotreme" to help steal submarine equipment. Federal agent Grant Farrell is dispatched to find the mysterious villain and stop his nefarious plans.
metadata.Writer: Paul Huston, Joseph F. Poland, Barry Shipman
metadata.Actors: Edmund MacDonald, Pamela Blake, Danny Morton
